ygData.subject: Re: Well balanced weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Well balanced weapons lose enormous value when purchased.  I bought a WB Rapier for 220 plat, the most a merchant would buy it back for was 50 plat!? I ended
ygData.messageBody:
Well balanced weapons lose enormous value when purchased. I bought a WB
Rapier for 220 plat, the most a merchant would buy it back for was 50 plat!?
I ended up trading it for a runed bone fork.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: chlebek@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Well balanced weapons
>Date: Tue, 13 Jul 1999 16:07:07 -0400
>
>From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>
>Does anyone know if well balanced weapons sell back to vendors for close to
>the
>sale price like combines do?
>
>For example I bought my combine longsword for 52p 6g and the vendor will
>buy it
>back for 47p 6g. So if I were to buy a well balanced longsword for around
>230pp
>would I get close to that when selling IT back?
>
>Thanks,
>Taelin
>
>P.S. I know there are better weapons for the money, but if the well
>balanced
>sell for close to buying price then I can "rent" one for a small fee until
>I
>find a deal on one of the better weapons.
